TopicTitle: The most stupid thing you did in KSP...

Articles.Content:
The question is in the title.

Mine is deorbiting a space plane with the space station still attached. (i was playing in IVA)

Whats yours?

There's already a thread for this: You Will Not Go to Space Today.

This is a duplicate, so, closing, but go on over there and join in the... catastrophe? (I don't know, "fun" seemed like slightly the wrong word, given the topic at hand.)
